title: How to Make Burgo

steps.headline: Pour rice flour, salt and sago into big bowl.
Pour the water into that big bowl.
Mix it well until the dough is blended.
Heat the water in a big frying pan or steamer.
steps.description: While the water is cooking, smear vegetable oil in baking pan.

steps.headline: Pour two ladles of dough in the baking pan.
steps.description: Take it into the frying pan or steamer. Steam it until dough is cooked.

steps.headline: Take it out and let it cool.
Do the same thing with all of the dough.
Sauté spices in the frying pan until it smells good.
steps.description: Pour coconut oil and milk. Then, mix it well until it is boiled.

steps.headline: Add salt, brown sugar, pepper, chicken stock and seasoning into frying pan.
steps.description: Mix it well again and cook it until it is boiled.

text: Burgo Pour rice flour, salt and sago into big bowl.  Pour the water into that big bowl.  Mix it well until the dough is blended.  Heat the water in a big frying pan or steamer. While the water is cooking, smear vegetable oil in baking pan. Pour two ladles of dough in the baking pan. Take it into the frying pan or steamer. Steam it until dough is cooked. Take it out and let it cool.  Roll burgo on the tray.  Do the same thing with all of the dough.  Soup Sauté spices in the frying pan until it smells good. Pour coconut oil and milk. Then, mix it well until it is boiled. Add salt, brown sugar, pepper, chicken stock and seasoning into frying pan. Mix it well again and cook it until it is boiled.
